channel.description: Recent content in Posts on DASC 1104 blog

item.title: Malaria over time
item.description: Malaria deaths For this project, I am examining the malaria deaths by age dataset contained in the malaria_deaths_age.csv file on the Tidy Tuesday website. The data consists of 30780 observations of 5 variables. The variable entity is a factor with 228 levels that represents the region for the deaths. The variable code is a factor with 196 levels which represents a three letter code for the country/region. The variable year is a discrete integer variable that records the years between 1990 and 2016.

item.title: My first post
item.description: My first post. I like the penguins library(tidyverse) library(palmerpenguins) glimpse(penguins) library(here) ## here() starts at /home/dasc/DASC-blog dat <- read_csv(here("data", "2012-18_playerBoxScore.csv")) ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## .default = col_double(), ## gmDate = col_date(format = ""), ## gmTime = col_time(format = ""), ## seasTyp = col_character(), ## playLNm = col_character(), ## playFNm = col_character(), ## teamAbbr = col_character(), ## teamConf = col_character(), ## teamDiv = col_character(), ## teamLoc = col_character(), ## teamRslt = col_character(), ## offLNm1 = col_character(), ## offFNm1 = col_character(), ## offLNm2 = col_character(), ## offFNm2 = col_character(), ## offLNm3 = col_character(), ## offFNm3 = col_character(), ## playDispNm = col_character(), ## playStat = col_character(), ## playPos = col_character(), ## playBDate = col_date(format = "") ## # .
